Name: FluentData version 3.0
Description:
* Simplified and improved the API
* New features to improve flexibility
* Some performance improvements

Name: FluentData version 2.3.0.0
Description:
- Added support for SQLite, PostgreSQL and IBM DB2.
- Added new method, QueryDataTable which returns the query result as a datatable.
- Fixed some issues.
- Some refactoring.
- Select builder with support for paging and improved support for auto mapping.

Name: Version 2.2.3.0 beta
Description:
- Fixed issue with float datatype.
- Added support for SqlLite, PostgreSql and IBM DB2.
- Select builder with support for paging and improved support for auto mapping. This feature is in Beta and currently no documentation is available.
- Misc refactoring.

Name: FluentData version 2.2.2
Description:
- UseSharedConnection has been added. This allows you to open a connection and manually control when to close it (dispose)
- AutoMap: Added support for nested properties with '_' in the name.

Name: FluentData version 2.2.1
Description: - Fixed a bug in insert and update builders: when calling AutoMap on an entity with an enumeration property then an exception was thrown.

Name: FluentData version 2.2
Description:
* Fixed issue with enumerations not working with automapping feature in the builders
* Breaking change: QueryNoAutoMap, the custom mapper signature has been modified from Action to Func. Instead of FluentData creating the entity it must now be created in the mapping method since this is more flexible. An optional method to use here is the Query method, it will both create the entity, automap and allow for a custom mapping method to be executed.
* QuerySingleNoAutoMap has been added
* Breaking change: UseTransaction property on the DbContext class has been changed from a property to a method UseTransaction(bool) in order to allow for enable(true)/disable(false) transaction.

Name: FluentData version 2.1
Description: - Support for MS Access has been added.

Name: FluentData version 2.0
Description:
New features:
- Support for events: OnConnectionClosed, OnConnectionOpened, OnConnectionOpening, OnError, OnExecuted, OnExecuting
- Added a CommandTimeout method on the Context. This allows you to set the time out for all the commands.
- QueryValues support has been added for Stored Procedures.

Changes to existing features:
- IgnoreProperty has been moved from a separate property to be a parameter in the AutoMap method.

Name: FluentData version 1.2
Description:
New features:
- QueryValues method
- Added support for automapping to enumerations (both int and string are supported).

Fixed 2 reported issues.

Name: FluentData version 1.1
Description:
New feature
- Added support for MySQL.

Name: FluentData version 3.0.1
Description: Misc bugfixes and some new features added since the change set of the previous release (#22252)
